treatment.reference: Isolation and Characterization of New Strains of Methanogens from Cold Terrestrial Habitats Syst Appl Microbiol 26:312-318
treatment.description: Isolated from anoxic sediments of a pond polluted with paper-mill waste water of the Syktyvkar Forest Industry Complex. Strain MSP was represented by motile irregular cocci with a diameter of 0.3–0.6 µm. Metabolized H2/CO2 and formate. Did not metabolize formate, 2-propanol/CO2, 2-butanol/CO2, methanethiol, dimethyl sulfide, methanol, monomethylamine, dimethylamine, trimethylamine, or acetate. Motile. Temperature range 5-35˚C, with temperature optimum of 25˚C.
